org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.source
Class ContentSource

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.excalibur.source.impl.AbstractSource
      org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.source.ContentSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.LogEnabled, org.apache.excalibur.source.Source
public class ContentSource
extends org.apache.excalibur.source.impl.AbstractSource
implements org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.LogEnabled

This source provides read-only access to a document's content.
